title: Convert Real Number to Fraction
description:
REAL_TO_FRAC converts a foating point number (REAL) in a fraction. The
function returns the data type is a FRACTION of the structure with 2 vaï¿¾lues. With the input X, the maximum size of the counter can be specifed.
Data type FRACTION:
*.NUMERATOR : INT (Numerator of the fraction)
*.DENOMINATOR : INT (Denominator of the fraction)
name: REAL_TO_FRAC

input.name: X
input.description: The real number to be converted into a fraction.

input.name: N
input.description: The maximum allowed size of the denominator.

output.name: NUMERATOR
output.description: The calculated numerator of the resulting fraction.

output.name: DENOMINATOR
output.description: The calculated denominator of the resulting fraction.

return_value.description: The fraction representation of the given real number containing numerator and denominator.

fields.name: NUMERATOR
fields.description: The numerator value of the fraction.

fields.name: DENOMINATOR
fields.description: The denominator value of the fraction.
